description: Capture the harvest process, including crops harvested, quantities, and any relevant notes. Each harvest should be documented separately.

media.title: Photograph the Harvest
media.description: Please take a clear photo of the harvested produce and the area where it was harvested.

details.title: Input Harvest Details
details.description: Please provide the following details about the harvest.
details.feedbackPlaceholder: Provide any notes about the harvest (conditions, issues, quality, etc.)

inputs.title: Quantity Harvested
inputs.placeholder: Enter the total number of items harvested

review.title: Review Harvest Details
review.description: Please review the details you have provided before submitting.
